sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"> <sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <choice_action>reject</choice_action> <coalesce>false</coalesce> <coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive> <coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields> <date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format> <map display_value="Transform Import Entity">f45c880bdb87541002085bd05b961956</map> <reference_value_field/> <source_field>[Script]</source_field> <source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) { var value = getValue(source.u_service_record_type.toString()); })(source); function getValue(valueStr){ var objectvalues = { 'Add-On': 0, 'Infra component': 7, 'Business Application': 1, 'Infra Component': 2, 'Mobile application': 3, 'Platform': 4, 'Website': 5, 'Workspace/Model': 6, }; return objectvalues[valueStr]; }]]></source_script> <source_table>x_anbib_grc_import_entity</source_table> <sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>marcos.michalski@alparservice.com.br</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-09 11:53:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>07b5b707dbcb941002085bd05b961965</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>[Script]</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="GRC" source="x_anbib_grc">1a6d93de1b6d58504aae202a2d4bcbdc</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="GRC">1a6d93de1b6d58504aae202a2d4bcbdc</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_07b5b707dbcb941002085bd05b961965</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>marcos.michalski@alparservice.com.br</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-15 17:22:18</sys_updated_on> <target_field>service_record_type</target_field> <target_table>x_anbib_grc_entity</target_table> <use_source_script>true</use_source_script> </sys_transform_entry> </record_update>
